https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lz2poVfHSWoEDo4GbAYmOIXKD13.jpg Since Bill died in 1993, his work has reached a new audience and he has become a powerful cult figure. The DVD captures Bill at his very best, with three of his legendary filmed performances: "One Night Stand" - the Old Vic Theatre in Chicago (30 min) "Revelations" - the Dominion Theatre in London (65 min) "Relentless" - Billâ€™s breakout performance at the Montreal Comedy Festival (70 min) Bill Hicks Live: Satirist, Social Critic, Stand-up Comedian
